author: Pamela Muse
text:
An Alliance member is looking for samples of agreements and/or MOU’s between two neighboring communities across state lines that share common goals, such as tourism, economic development, transportation, etc.  Or agreement/MOU’s between two (or more) local governments within the same state sharing these same goals would be helpful too.  
The county is trying to more formally create a “bridge” and/or a partnership/understanding between the county and a “destination city” that recognizes how critical each are to each other and how it is in our best interests as neighbors to work together closely – despite being in different states.  
Please forward links and/or your documents.  Your hard work is appreciated!
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450
pmuse@transformgov.org
title: Neighboring Community Agreements Across State Lines
